Sentencas: We have investigated the relationship between the chemical compatibility and electrochemical properties of La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Co0.2O3 (LSCF), LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 (LNF), and La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (LSM) as a cathode against the Cr poisoning condition.
Titulo: Chemical compatibility and electrochemical property of intermediate-temperature SOFC cathodes under Cr poisoning condition

Sentencas: Powder mixtures of LSCF-Cr2O3, LSM-Cr2O3, and LNF-Cr2O3 were heated at 1073 K and analyzed by X-ray powder diffraction with the Rietveld refinement.
Titulo: Chemical compatibility and electrochemical property of intermediate-temperature SOFC cathodes under Cr poisoning condition

Sentencas: It was found that LNF powder was less reactive with Cr2O3 than LSCF and LSM powder from the viewpoint of the consumption of Cr2O3 in the mixtures.
Titulo: Chemical compatibility and electrochemical property of intermediate-temperature SOFC cathodes under Cr poisoning condition

Sentencas: From electrochemical measurement, it was found that the cathodic overvoltage was almost unchanged for cells with LNF cathode, either in the presence or absence of a Cr-containing alloy.
Titulo: Chemical compatibility and electrochemical property of intermediate-temperature SOFC cathodes under Cr poisoning condition

Sentencas: On the other hand, the cells with LSCF and LSM cathode in the presence of the alloy exhibited a steep increase in the overvoltage curve.
Titulo: Chemical compatibility and electrochemical property of intermediate-temperature SOFC cathodes under Cr poisoning condition

Sentencas: These results show that LNF cathode is more stable against Cr poisoning than the other two cathodes.
Titulo: Chemical compatibility and electrochemical property of intermediate-temperature SOFC cathodes under Cr poisoning condition

Sentencas: Therefore, we expect LNF to be a long-life cathode with high stability against Cr poisoning in solid oxide fuel cell because of the low reactivity of LNF with Cr2O3.
Titulo: Chemical compatibility and electrochemical property of intermediate-temperature SOFC cathodes under Cr poisoning condition
Chemical compatibility and electrochemical property of intermediate-temperature SOFC cathodes under Cr poisoning condition
